title: Building a Stronger America: America Wants Infrastructure Reform – The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		Infrastructure & Technology	

Issued on:
February 14, 2018
It’s time to put up soaring new infrastructure that inspires pride in our people and our towns.
						President Donald J. Trump					PUBLIC SUPPORT: The American people overwhelmingly support taking action to rebuild our nation’s infrastructure.INDUSTRY SUPPORT: American businesses understand how critical infrastructure is to our economy and have shown widespread support for investing in its repair.BIPARTISAN AGREEMENT: There has been strong bipartisan support for repairing our aging infrastructure and for reducing unnecessary delays in the permitting process.
